creditline: Gift of Dr. Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg in honor of Elizabeth K. Mix (Menon)
description: black and white image of an older male figure and younger female figure seated at a table outdoors; shrubbery and trees in URQ; figure in a top hat resting in a carriage behind male figure in ULQ; text in French on top margin reads, "MAYEUX ET ROBERT MACAIRE"; text on bottom margin
provenance: [Flea market, Paris, early 1990s, to Mix]; Elizabeth Mix, Indianapolis (given to Weisbergs); Gabe and Yvonne Weisberg, Minneapolis (until 2018; given to Mia)
title: Mayeux et Robert Macaire - Oui, Charmante j'ai le dos vouté...
